column4: I was just testing a new 8 GB ipod nano. The partitions get recognized and are mountable. However it doesn't show up on the gnome desktop. On the same computer I tested the older 2GB version which works as expected. Is this a known problem?
i can access the partitions if i mount them manually
ah. so it's not you can;t read the filesystem. dunno, not an iPod user at all.
